        public void setPlayer(int playerID,
                      java.lang.String nickname,
                      ServerConnection serverConnection)
        Adds a player to a game, if one doesn't exists it creates a game and adds the player to it
        Parameters:
        playerID - is the id of the player who just connected
        nickname - is the nickname of the player who just connected
        serverConnection - is the server of the player who just connected

        serverConnection - is the server connection of the player

        public boolean checkDisconnection(java.lang.String playerName)
        Checks if a nickname is associated to a player who is disconnected
        Parameters:
        playerName - is the nickname of the player
        Returns:
        true if the nickname is associated to a player who is disconnected

      • checkRegistration

        public boolean checkRegistration(java.lang.String nickname)
        Checks if the nickname is already taken by a user
        Parameters:
        nickname - is the nickname to check
        Returns:
        true if the nickname is not associated to any user
